short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lucky Looter is a fun online game where you will be playing as a burglar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lucky Looter is a fun online game where you will be playing as a burglar. Your objective is rather simple - you need to break into a house, steal as much stuff as you can and then run back into your car. The more stuff you steal the more stars you’ll earn, so take care. The first level will be simple enough, but in the second level, there will be a police man that you’ll have to avoid, since he will be trying to catch you. Be careful and try to stay in the shadows. The game can also be played on the phone, so come on, try it out!
